  • Constructor Details

    • EventOrganiserServiceImpl

      @Autowired public EventOrganiserServiceImpl(EventOrganiserRepository eventOrganiserRepository, EventOrganiserDtoMapper eventOrganiserDtoMapper, EmailServiceImpl emailService, AmazonS3Service amazonS3Service, org.springframework.security.crypto.password.PasswordEncoder passwordEncoder)
      Constructs an instance of EventOrganiserServiceImpl with the specified dependencies. This constructor is used for dependency injection to set various repositories, mappers, services, and other dependencies required for managing event organisers in the application.
      Parameters:
      eventOrganiserRepository - The EventOrganiserRepository to interact with event organiser data.
      eventOrganiserDtoMapper - The EventOrganiserDtoMapper for mapping Event Organiser entities to DTOs.
      emailService - The EmailServiceImpl for sending emails.
      amazonS3Service - The AmazonS3Service for interacting with Amazon S3 storage.
      passwordEncoder - The PasswordEncoder for encoding and decoding passwords.

  • Method Details

    • findAllEventOrganisers

      public List<EventOrganiserDisplayDto> findAllEventOrganisers()
      Retrieves a list of Event Organisers from the database and maps them to EventOrganiserDisplayDto objects. This method returns a list of EventOrganiserDisplayDto representing the event organisers.
      Specified by:
      findAllEventOrganisers in interface EventOrganiserService
      Returns:
      A List of EventOrganiserDisplayDto containing information about the event organisers.

    • findAllEventsByOrganiser

      public List<Event> findAllEventsByOrganiser(Integer organiserId)
      Retrieves a list of events organized by a specific Event Organiser identified by their unique ID.
      Specified by:
      findAllEventsByOrganiser in interface EventOrganiserService
      Parameters:
      organiserId - The unique ID of the Event Organiser whose organized events are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A List of Event objects representing the events organized by the specified Event Organiser. If the Event Organiser with the given ID is not found, an empty list is returned.

    • findEventOrganisersByReviewStatus

      public List<EventOrganiserDisplayDto> findEventOrganisersByReviewStatus(String status)
      Retrieves a list of Event Organisers based on their review status and sorts them by creation date in ascending order.
      Specified by:
      findEventOrganisersByReviewStatus in interface EventOrganiserService
      Parameters:
      status - The review status to filter Event Organisers (e.g., "approved," "pending," "rejected").
      Returns:
      A List of EventOrganiserDisplayDto objects representing Event Organisers that match the specified review status.

    • findOrganiserById

      public Optional<EventOrganiserDisplayDto> findOrganiserById(Integer organiserId)
      Retrieves an Event Organiser by their unique identifier and returns it as an Optional of EventOrganiserDisplayDto.
      Specified by:
      findOrganiserById in interface EventOrganiserService
      Parameters:
      organiserId - The unique identifier of the Event Organiser to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing an EventOrganiserDisplayDto if an Event Organiser with the specified ID is found, or an empty Optional if not found.

    • saveEventOrganiser

      public EventOrganiser saveEventOrganiser(EventOrganiser eventOrganiser)
      Saves an Event Organiser in the database.
      Specified by:
      saveEventOrganiser in interface EventOrganiserService
      Parameters:
      eventOrganiser - The Event Organiser to be saved.
      Returns:
      The saved Event Organiser, including any generated unique identifiers.

    • updateEventOrganiser

      public EventOrganiser updateEventOrganiser(EventOrganiserUpdateDto eventOrganiserUpdateDto)
      Updates an existing Event Organiser based on the information provided in the EventOrganiserUpdateDto.
      Specified by:
      updateEventOrganiser in interface EventOrganiserService
      Parameters:
      eventOrganiserUpdateDto - The data containing the updates for the Event Organiser.
      Returns:
      The updated Event Organiser after the modifications.
      Throws:
      NonExistentException - If the Event Organiser with the specified ID does not exist.

    • updateEventOrganiserImage

      public EventOrganiser updateEventOrganiserImage(Integer organiserId, String filename)
      Updates the logo image of an existing Event Organiser.
      Specified by:
      updateEventOrganiserImage in interface EventOrganiserService
      Parameters:
      organiserId - The unique identifier of the Event Organiser.
      filename - The new filename of the logo image to be associated with the Event Organiser.
      Returns:
      The updated Event Organiser after setting the new logo image.

    • deleteEventOrganiser

      public String deleteEventOrganiser(Integer organiserId)
      Deletes an Event Organiser by marking it as deleted in the database.
      Specified by:
      deleteEventOrganiser in interface EventOrganiserService
      Parameters:
      organiserId - The unique identifier of the Event Organiser to be deleted.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the result of the deletion operation, including success or an error message. If the Event Organiser is already deleted, it returns a message indicating that it's already deleted.
      Throws:
      NonExistentException - if there is no Event Organiser with the specified ID.
